caption.title: Epidemics for individual types/subtypes as defined by the criteria including small epidemics: (A) A(H1N1), (B) A(H3N2), and (C) B.
caption.p: Black lines are ILI+ observations; red horizontal lines are baselines; blue vertical lines are the identified onsets; cyan vertical lines are identified endings; grey vertical lines are year divisions.
Click here for additional data file.
